title: WHn are they gonna nerf Zoe?
body: Seriously, her paddle star is NOT ok, I was hit by it when I was asleep and she had luden's echo + sorcerer's and I took 1520 Magic damage + 390 true damage, who's the idiot who thought these numbers were okay?

How to get a kill as Zoe: Use W. The End.

1520 +390 true dmg... with two items isnt really possible..   I could understand if u meant 1520 fmg, with 320 of that dmg being true dmg..  Maximum dmg she could do with 2 items and only using q and e is     1525.   This is all assuming she has rabadons.. and a 100 ap item.   (100 AP +120 AP) +the passive from rabadons would leave her at around 300 ap  (less than 310) 

The Maximum from the Q is 837 (base plus 150%)
The E would do 220 base plus 40%  and to proc it twice would be 688 in total.   This is ALLLL  before magic resist is applied.

This is also ignoring the fact that needs alot of set up lol.   take cleanse/barrier..or even heal if u really want to avoid the E.  buy an mr item, use ur minions to ur advantage (tho im guessing this wouldve happened in the river/jg).   Her unbalance lies within the W.  while the q-e combo is annoying, many have come to peace with it (especially after the nerfs).

She wont one shot you level 2 anymore
You just have to learn how to play around her
